body_html:
Thanks @kawaiiQ for reporting and the reproducer and for trying TF w/ MKL-DNN.
Thanks @asimshankar for including me. I could reproduce the error with build from src with TF v1.11 w/ MKL-DNN, so we take the responsibility to fix the bug. Please stay tuned. Thank you!

Eigen will exit silently (i.e. no error). TF w/ MKL-DNN errors out with the above error.

body:
Thanks @kawaiiQ for reporting and the reproducer and for trying TF w/ MKL-DNN. 
Thanks @asimshankar for including me. I could reproduce the error with build from src with TF v1.11 w/ MKL-DNN, so we take the responsibility to fix the bug. Please stay tuned. Thank you! 

Eigen will exit silently (i.e. no error). TF w/ MKL-DNN errors out with the above error.
